channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 20 Upcoming Fantasy Books Coming Out In 2025
item.description: 2025 is shaping up to be a good year for fantasy books, with many exciting new releases hitting shelves – a lot of which are much-anticipated sequels.

item.title: 8 Things Sony's Spider-Man Universe Actually Got Right
item.description: The Sony’s Spider-Man Universe is largely considered a failure, there were some redeeming features and moments in which the franchise excelled.

item.title: Sean Penn's Classic 1982 Raunchy Coming-Of-Age Movie Is Leaving Netflix Very Soon
item.description: Two-time Oscar winner Sean Penn's career-catapulting, classic, and raunchy 1982 coming-of-age comedy movie is leaving the Netflix lineup.
